name: shellaquiles-web
description: Landing page con estilo terminal para shellaquiles.org - Comunidad de Comunidades

scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run copy && npm run minify
scripts.build:dev: npm run clean && npm run copy
scripts.copy: mkdir -p dist && cp -r src dist/ && cp index.html dist/
scripts.minify: echo 'Minification would go here in production'
scripts.deploy: npm run build && echo 'Deploy dist/ folder to your hosting service'

author: Shellaquiles Community
